#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int n,in,fn;
int v[50002];
int w[10002];
int dp[10002];

int flag;
int rec(int cur_wt)
{
	if(cur_wt == fn){
		//flag=1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if(dp[cur_wt] != -1)
		return dp[cur_wt];
	
	int ans=1e9;
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{	
		if((cur_wt + w[i]) <= fn)
			ans = min(ans,rec(cur_wt+w[i])+v[i]);
	}
	/*	if(ans == INT_MAX)
	return dp[cur_wt] = 0;
	else*/
	return dp[cur_wt]=ans;
}



int main()
{
	
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int ans;
	
	while(t>0)
	{
		cin>>in>>fn;
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>v[i]>>w[i];
		}
	
		if(fn-in == 0)
			cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<0<<"."<<endl;
	
		else{
			memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
			flag=0;
			ans= rec(in);
			if(ans == 1e9)
				cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<ans<<"."<<endl;
		}
	
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
